mapper.select: /*사업장 코드로 설치된 키오스크 조회*/ SELECT ikl.kiosk_serial_num AS kioskSerialNum FROM installed_kiosk_list AS ikl WHERE ikl.approval_partner_plus_info_code = #{partnerCode};
/*지도에 뿌려질 위도와 경도 가져오기*/ SELECT um.latitude AS locationLatitude, um.longitude AS locationLongitude FROM user_manage AS um WHERE um.user_level='설치사업장';

/*설치된 키오스크 리스트*/ SELECT ikl.kiosk_serial_num AS kioskSerialNum, appi.partner_name AS partnerName, appi.partner_addr AS partnerAddr, sc.static_code_content AS statiCode FROM installed_kiosk_list AS ikl INNER JOIN approval_partner_plus_info AS appi on ikl.approval_partner_plus_info_code = appi.approval_partner_plus_info_code INNER join static_code AS sc ON ikl.static_code = sc.static_code ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(kiosk_serial_num,'num', -1) AS UNSIGNED);
